name: scrypted
description: Scrypted is a self-hosted smart home automation platform for integrating devices like HomeKit, Google Home, and Alexa. It supports plugins, video streams, and custom automation flows.
features: Smart home integration: Connects devices to HomeKit, Google Home, Alexa, and other platforms.
Video streaming: Manages camera feeds with transcoding, recording, and remote access.
Plugin ecosystem: Extends functionality with plugins for devices, protocols, and services.
Automation engine: Creates complex automation flows with triggers, conditions, and actions.
Device bridging: Exposes devices from one platform to another for cross-ecosystem control.
Local processing: Runs AI and video processing locally for privacy and reduced latency.
Object detection: Identifies people, vehicles, and objects in camera feeds using AI.
Two-way audio: Enables intercom functionality through supported cameras and doorbells.
Recording management: Stores and manages video recordings with configurable retention policies.
Mobile apps: Control devices and view cameras from iOS and Android apps.
Notification system: Sends alerts for motion, doorbell presses, and automation events.
Hardware acceleration: Leverages GPU and specialized hardware for efficient video processing.
